CustomField.name: JournalUsage
CustomField.comment: The number of times this data is used in the Journal table.

CustomField.name: GiftBatchUsage
CustomField.comment: The number of times this data is used in the Gift Batch table.

CustomField.name: TableSource
CustomField.comment: The data table that contributed this row. One of 'GB', 'J' or 'DEX'.

CustomField.name: LedgerNumber
CustomField.comment: The Ledger number that references this rate.

CustomField.name: BatchNumber
CustomField.comment: The Batch number that references this rate.

CustomField.name: JournalNumber
CustomField.comment: The Journal number that references this rate. Value is 0 for Gift Batch.

CustomField.name: BatchStatus
CustomField.comment: The Batch status of the batch that references this rate.

CustomField.name: TableSource
CustomField.comment: The data table that contributed this row. One of 'GB', 'J' or 'DEX'.
